item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we‚Äôve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It‚Äôs Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags‚Ä¶ everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.

Bag Dimensions
15″ x 13″ x 7″ 17″ x 11″ x 6″

Bowl Diameter
7″ 5″

Food Container Capacity
16 cups (8 cups each) 12 cups

Placemat
16″ x 12″

Poop Bag Dispenser

‚úì

Water Resistant Fabric

‚úì

‚úì

Removable Divider

‚úì

Luggage Handle Sleeve

‚úì

‚úì

Lined Treat Bag

‚úì

‚úì

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 15 x 7 x 13 inches; 2.78 Pounds
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé 1001
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé January 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé rubyloo
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B087N9J3DX
Country of Origin ‚Äè : ‚Äé China

Dog Diaper Bag, Anyone? As dog owners, we know what really makes life with dogs easier. We added the poop bag dispenser to the puppy travel bag so you never end up in a ‚Äòstinky‚Äô situation again! Our travel dog bag set is a great idea for dog mom, dog dad, and pet lover gifts!
Do You Want A Clean And Organized Car? Our removable divider and multiple pockets keep your and your dog’s essentials organized for your next beach, hiking, or overnight road trip! All your dog camping gear and travel supplies in one dog travel bag – always good to go. Our dog bags for traveling are airline-approved and feature a handy suitcase sleeve.
Good Dogs Deserve Great Gear! With premium padded straps for comfort and generous storage for dog travel accessories, you can carry the comforts of home on the go. Trust our commitment to quality with our portable dog food travel bags with high-quality zippers & water-resistant fabric. A sustainable substitute for plastic bags!
100% Lifetime Manufacturer Guarantee. At Rubyloo (Formerly Lucky Tail), it‚Äôs our mission to reinvent dog products to make your life better together. We‚Äôre a US-based company that provides innovation and quality you can trust. With our ‚ÄòEvery Dog Should Have A Home‚Äô initiative, your purchase will help a rescue find their forever home.

No More Stress About Mess With Rubyloo

We designed our bags with water-resistant fabric, which also helps with stain resistance because we know that things can get messy with dogs around. If your bag does get dirty, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and mild dish soap.

Making It Easier To Seek Adventures Together

As dog owners, we know how important but challenging it can be to go places with your dog. So we‚Äôve designed our bags to make it easier to seek adventures with your best friend by your side. As a part of the family, your dog deserves their own luggage!

2 Bowls & 2 Food Containers

Our 2x collapsible bowls are large capacity to work well with many sizes of dogs. You also get 2x insulated dog food containers with leak-proof lining for smell free travel.

Poop Happens!

Rubyloo dog bag for travel stands out from the rest with our poop bag dispenser pocket! Load a few rolls and thread one through the hole for easy access when and where you need it!

Everything Has It‚Äôs Place

Don’t worry, we’ve thought of EVERYTHING! There’s a place for food, brush, bowls, leashes, collar, medicines, bandanas, poop bags‚Ä¶ everything your buddy needs while on the road with you!

Say Goodbye To Torn Plastic Bags

Have you been stuffing multiple plastic bags with food, toys and gear, only to have them break or those curious noses find their way into the food? The Doggy Bag makes travel simple, keeping all of your dog’s stuff in one bag that’s easy to organize and keeps food safe and secure.

The Best Bag For Your Best Friend

We want to help you make your dog feel part of the family wherever you need to go. With a pocket for everything, our bags are great for camping, road trips, and just about any adventure.
